712754f-b.text:
West 41st Street, west from Dyer Avenue, the new thoroughfare that leads to the Lincoln Tunnel. This is between Ninth and Tenth Avenues. The photographer is viewing towards the latter and beyond which appears the spire atop St. Raphael's R. C. Church. View 2 is limited to the north side of the street, detailing the structures lying between Dyer and Tenth Avenues. September 4, 1940. Nos. 1-2

P. L. Sperr
